verses.verse: <S%H3588>If<s%> one be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, <S%H5307>lying<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and it be not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H2491>slain<s%> him:

Then your <S%H2205>elders<s%> and your <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and they shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> about him that is <S%H2491>slain:<s%>

And it shall be, that the <S%H5892>city<s%> which is <S%H7138>next<s%> to the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> even the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> an <S%H5697>heifer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has not been <S%H5647>worked<s%> with, and <S%H834>which<s%> has not <S%H4900>drawn<s%> in the <S%H5923>yoke;<s%>

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall bring <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> to a <S%H386>rough<s%> <S%H5158>valley,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5647>eared<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2232>sown,<s%> and shall strike off the <S%H5697>heifer's<s%> <S%H6203>neck<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> shall <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near;<s%> for them the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to him, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and by their <S%H6310>word<s%> shall <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7379>controversy<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5061>stroke<s%> be tried:

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city,<s%> that are <S%H7138>next<s%> to the <S%H2491>slain<s%> man, shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> that is <S%H6202>beheaded<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley:<s%>

And they shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Our <S%H3027>hands<s%> have not <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> it.

Be <S%H3722>merciful,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> not <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H7130>charge.<s%> And the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H3722>forgiven<s%> them.

So shall you <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the guilt of <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you, <S%H3588>when<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and you have taken them <S%H7617>captive,<s%>
And <S%H7200>see<s%> among the <S%H7633>captives<s%> a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H8389><s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> and have a <S%H2836>desire<s%> to her, that you would have her to your <S%H802>wife;<s%>
Then you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> her <S%H8432>home<s%> to your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and she shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> her <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6213>pare<s%> her <S%H6856>nails;<s%>

And she shall <S%H5493>put<s%> the <S%H8071>raiment<s%> of her <S%H7633>captivity<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> her, and shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1058>mourn<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> and her <S%H517>mother<s%> a <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H3391>month:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that you shall <S%H935>go<s%> in to her, and be her <S%H1167>husband,<s%> and she shall be your <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And it shall be, <S%H518>if<s%> you have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in her, then you shall let her <S%H7971>go<s%> where she <S%H5315>will;<s%> but you shall not <S%H4376>sell<s%> her at <S%H3605>all<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> you shall not <S%H6014>make<s%> <S%H6014>merchandise<s%> of her, <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her.

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H157>beloved,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H8130>hated,<s%> and they have <S%H3205>born<s%> him <S%H1121>children,<s%> both the <S%H157>beloved<s%> and the <S%H8130>hated;<s%> and if the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> be hers that was <S%H8146>hated:<s%>

Then it shall be, <S%H3117>when<s%> he makes his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1961>has,<s%> that he <S%H3201>may<s%> not make the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H157>beloved<s%> <S%H1069>firstborn<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H8130>hated,<s%> which is indeed the <S%H1060>firstborn:<s%>

But he shall <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H8130>hated<s%> for the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> by <S%H5414>giving<s%> him a <S%H8147>double<s%> <S%H6310>portion<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H4672>has:<s%> for he is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H202>strength;<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> is his.

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> which will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> or the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and that, when they have <S%H3256>chastened<s%> him, will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them:

Then shall his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on him, and <S%H3318>bring<s%> him out to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H4725>place;<s%>

And they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> our <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious,<s%> he will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> our <S%H6963>voice;<s%> he is a <S%H2151>glutton,<s%> and a <S%H5435>drunkard.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die:<s%> so shall you <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you; and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H1961>committed<s%> a <S%H2399>sin<s%> worthy of <S%H4194>death,<s%> and he be to be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and you <S%H8518>hang<s%> him <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H6086>tree:<s%>

His <S%H5038>body<s%> shall not <S%H3885>remain<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night on the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> but you shall in any wise <S%H6912>bury<s%> him that <S%H3117>day;<s%> (for he that is <S%H8518>hanged<s%> is <S%H7045>accursed<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%>) that your <S%H127>land<s%> be not <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
